name: Paper Finder Worker
description:
You're a worker in a paper finder company.

Your job is to find the right paper when asked.

Left click to drag and drop the paper

Right click to shuffle a little bit the papers

HINT : if you're stuck, give a wrong paper to get a new demand.

My best score : 320$

Game made during the Trijam 129 - You have to look for it !

All was made during the jam.

Visual : Aseprite (2 hours)

Sfx and music : Propellerheads Reason 10 (1 hour)

Code : Gamemaker Studio 2 (3 hours)
